meanings.definition: Having flowers arranged in a raceme.
meanings.sent1: The racemed flowers on the plant looked beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with racemed flowers of various colors.
meanings.sent3: The racemed flowers seemed to be dancing in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a racemed manner, with small flowers pinned throughout.
meanings.sent5: The racemed arrangement of flowers created a stunning visual display.

meanings.sent1: The racemed fruits hung in clusters from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The vine had racemed leaves growing along its length.
meanings.sent3: The racemed pattern of lights on the ceiling gave the room a festive look.
meanings.sent4: The racemed design of the necklace made it unique and eye-catching.
meanings.sent5: The racemed rows of books on the shelf made it easy to find a specific title.

meanings.definition: A type of inflorescence in which the main axis bears lateral stalked flowers.
meanings.sent1: The racemed of the plant made it stand out in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the racemed of the flower carefully.
meanings.sent3: The racemed of the tree made it a favorite spot for birds to perch.
meanings.sent4: The racemed of the bouquet gave it a unique and elegant appearance.
meanings.sent5: The racemed of the arrangement added a touch of sophistication to the room.
